General.Name: Vingroup JSC
General.Description: Vingroup Joint Stock Company constructs, invests, and trades in real estate properties in Vietnam. The company operates through Real estate transfer business; Trading in investment real estate and providing related services; Business hotel services, entertainment and related services; Medical activities and related services; Educational activities and related services; Manufacturing activities; and Other business activities segments. It develops, leases, and manages apartments, villas, and shop-houses; and leases office and retail areas. The company also operates hotels, resorts, restaurants, amusement parks, entertainment center, safari, and conservation park; and department stores. In addition, it offers security, information technology, consulting, management, residential and civil construction, short-term accommodation, cargo handling, warehousing, transportation, travel agency, golf course management, data processing, financial, healthcare and medical, and goods storage services; and publishes books. Further, the company retail cars; mines minerals and other materials; manufactures communication equipment, batteries, accumulators, automotive vehicles, and related products; retails computers, software, and telecommunication and audio-visual devices; sells and repairs passenger cars, light motor vehicles, and motor vehicle parts; and imports and distributes goods. Additionally, it engages in market research and development, e-commerce platform, and software production activities; and research and experimental development in natural science and technology, as well as organizes exhibitions, events, conferences, and seminars. The company was formerly known as Vincom Joint Stock Company and changed its name to Vingroup Joint Stock Company in April 2012. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
